data.lyric:
[ti:Noir (누아르)]
[ar:선미 (宣美)]
[al:Noir]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.45]Noir (누아르) - 선미 (宣美)
[00:01.08]词：선미
[00:01.15]曲：선미/EL CAPITXN
[00:01.28]Session Synthesizer by：EL CAPITXN
[00:01.45]Piano by：EL CAPITXN
[00:01.58]Guitar by：VENDORS
[00:01.68]Chorus by：선미
[00:01.78]Recorded by：허은숙
[00:01.88]Mixed by：고현정 @KoKo Sound
[00:02.04]Mastered by：Randy Merrill @Sterling Sound, NYC
[00:08.38]Noir noir
[00:25.84]왜 늘 엇갈리는 거야
[00:29.80]걸음은 한 발짝 느려
[00:33.94]그새 스쳐 지나가
[00:35.98]그제서야 돌아봐
[00:37.68]뻔하디 뻔하잖아
[00:39.63]I've already seen this before
[00:43.15]I feel so high
[00:45.39]흐릿해져 하나 둘 셋
[00:48.71]Now I'm blind
[00:51.00]I don't know why
[00:53.15]보지 않아도
[00:54.54]알잖아 bad ending
[00:58.19]We are in noir
[01:00.64]이제 없어 너와
[01:06.62]We are in noir
[01:08.83]이제 그만 놔
[01:14.07]Noir noir
[01:31.45]You know what you're talking too much
[01:35.47]봤잖아 그러다
[01:37.24]제일 먼저 피 보는 클리셰
[01:39.56]하긴 이도 저도 뭐도 아닐 바에
[01:42.48]차라리 그게 더 나아
[01:44.52]Blah blah bullshhh
[01:45.55]I've already seen this before
[01:48.78]I feel so high
[01:50.90]흐릿해져 하나 둘 셋
[01:54.41]Now I'm blind
[01:56.65]I don't know why
[01:58.96]보지 않아도
[02:00.17]알잖아 bad ending
[02:04.02]We are in noir
[02:06.30]이제 없어 너와
[02:12.25]We are in noir
[02:14.40]이제 그만 놔
[02:19.72]Noir noir
[02:36.73]Feel like nobody else is here
[02:40.78]Feel like nobody else is here
[02:45.01]너는 어떤 표정일까
[02:48.34]No need to take a look
[02:50.14]Cuz I know what is the next
[02:53.08]We are in noir
[02:55.51]이제 없어 너와
[03:01.26]We are in noir
[03:03.71]이제 그만 놔
[03:08.89]Noir noir
